scripts.fetchUserProfile: function(accessToken, ctx, cb){ request.get('https://api.twitch.tv/kraken/user', { headers: { 'Authorization': 'OAuth ' + accessToken, 'Accept': 'application/vnd.twitchtv.v5+json' } }, function(e, r, b) { if (e) return cb(e); if (r.statusCode !== 200 ) return cb(new Error('StatusCode: ' + r.statusCode)); var profile = JSON.parse(b); profile.id = profile._id; delete profile._id; profile.links=profile._links; delete profile._links; return cb(null, profile);});}
